findings.title: Visibility (public / external) is not needed for constructors anymore
findings.description: The visibility concept for constructors is obsolete and can be marked as abstract to prevent a contract from being created.

findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive privileges to perform critical operations such as withdrawing tokens, changing precision and percentValue, staking funds to protocol, and more.

findings.title: ERC20Wallet: Owner or Laser wallets can withdraw tokens
findings.description: Owner or Laser wallets have unauthorized access to withdraw tokens from ERC20Wallet.

findings.title: Owner Privilege: Changing Precision and Percent Value
findings.description: The owner of LazerMerchantWalletController has the privilege to change precision and percentValue, which can lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Only Owner can withdraw funds
findings.description: The owner has exclusive privileges to withdraw funds.

findings.title: Only Owner can stake funds to protocol
findings.description: The owner has exclusive privileges to stake funds to the protocol.

findings.title: Only Owner can withdraw stake from protocol
findings.description: The contract has a privilege where only the owner can withdraw stake from the protocol.

findings.title: LazerStorageOwners: Owner can change storage oracles status
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the status of storage oracles.

findings.title: Storage oracles can reassign themselves
findings.description: Storage oracles have the ability to reassign themselves.

findings.title: LazerStorage: Storage oracles can create and update stake records
findings.description: Storage oracles have the privilege to create and update stake records in LazerStorage.

findings.title: Storage oracles can create wallet mapping
findings.description: Storage oracles have the capability to create wallet mappings.

findings.title: Storage oracles can create merchant to walletId mapping
findings.description: Storage oracles have the capability to create a mapping between merchants and their corresponding wallet IDs.
